title: Dynamic Multimedia-Based Project Class for Organic Chemistry Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of general chemistry fundamentals and organic compound nomenclature
context.additional_context: Organic chemistry reaction mechanism learning focused on aldol reactions, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Explain molecular formulas and reaction mechanisms with 80% accuracy after watching a learning video
Present three or more cases demonstrating the linkage between symbolic and microscopic levels through project deliverables
Analyze the educational effectiveness of learning videos using a 5-point scale through peer and self-assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
